mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question(cno, content, category) VALUES(#{cno},#{content},#{category});
mapper.select: SELECT q.qno, cno cno, category category, content content, q.regdate regdate, CAST((COUNT(ano) / (SELECT COUNT(username) FROM student WHERE cno = #{no}) *100) AS signed integer) rate, CAST(AVG(indicator) AS signed integer) avg FROM question q LEFT JOIN answer a ON q.qno = a.qno WHERE q.cno = #{no} GROUP BY q.qno ORDER BY q.qno DESC LIMIT #{limit}, #{amount}
SELECT count(q.qno) FROM question q WHERE q.cno = #{no} ORDER BY q.qno DESC
